about_the_game:
Skin Creator DLC gives a user the possibility to upload created skins to the Workshop.
Skin Creator DLC gives a user additional 5 slots for every weapon.

Also this DLC unlock additional content:
Patterns: Metal
Stickers: Worriors, Splats
detailed_description:

Skin Creator DLC gives a user additional 5 slots for every weapon.
